speaker: Arcanum Hall
lines: Stone columns are etched with sigils; the ceiling is a careful map of stars.
Lecterns stand arranged for study; chalk dust hangs in the light.
A brazier burns low. It warms the room more than the hands.
Wards hum behind the walls with a steady, watchful note.
A professor's silhouette moves behind a curtain as a lesson ends.
On a table, a focus crystal spins in a brass cradle.
A bell signals the start of a class.
The Dean's door is ajar. The training bell rings twice. The archives wait.

choices.text: Slip to the archives while whispers are friendly.
